import React from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import img1 from "./img1.jpg" const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root:{ display:"flex", justifyContent:"space-around", alignItems:"center", minHeight:"100vh" }, img:{ width:"100%", display:"block", transform:"scale(1.3)", transition:"all 0.3s ease-out", '&:hover': { transform:"scale(1.1) transLateY(-20px) ", } }, description:{ position:"absolute", left:"0px", bottom:"0px", width:"100%", padding:"15px", textAlign:"center", color:"#fff", fontSize:"18px" }, uicard:{ width:"350px", background:"radial-gradient(#111 50% , #000 100% )", overflow:"hidden" }, })) const Recom = () => { const classes=useStyles() return ( <>
Recommended Rooms

Rs.500 Pernight Size: 30ft Capacity: Max Person 5 Services: wifi,television.bathroom Book Now
) } export default Recom
